QuestData.Title: Attack on Nethergarde
QuestData.Description: The Iron Horde controls Nethergarde Keep, but they are fools if they think we will let them retain such a strategic position.$b$bMy best troops are more than eager to spill the blood of those savages, but we need a champion like yourself to lead the charge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant the Horde flags inside Nethergarde Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: The Iron Horde will learn to fear us, as they should.

Objectives.Objective: Flag planted in the center of Nethergarde
Flag planted outside of the main keep
